data.actual_result: virtual keyboard blocks the user action options at the mini profile.
data.expected_result: virtual keyboard should close upon opening mini profile.
data.short_description: virtual keyboard does not close when viewing mini profile
data.steps_to_repro: - NOTE: This was tested in google keyboard. Idk if this works with other virtual keyboards as well - go to a text channel at your server. - open emoji picker. then open virtual keyboard. repeat it as many times as you want. - open someone's mini profile. observe
